divs: Sighting DetailsLast summer I was with my mother and son at Hackert Lake. While they were swimming I sat on the beach. During my sit on the beach I happened to look up at the sky and saw something that in my minds eye initially thought was a bi-plane. Upon looking at it longer I realized that if it was a bi-plane the wings would be thin and horizontal --- not cigar shaped. It just looked like a long light blue cigar shape flying in the sky with C shaped ends. I watched it's trajectory and when it came to the nearest cloud, it went behind and never came back out again. This cloud was relatively small too. I kept watching it to see it reappear and it didn't. The clouds were small and spread far apart.
Summary: Cigar shaped object over Hackert Lake
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ludington
There were no other sightings in Ludington on or around July 30th 2012
